notes: Very modern, newly renovated studio with minimalist design, LED ambient lighting, built-in platform bed, high-end kitchen with wine fridge and built-in oven/microwave, and two modern bathrooms with glass shower enclosures and smart toilets. The raised platform bed area and open shelving could pose minor baby safety concerns as the child grows. Excellent cleanliness and good natural light through large windows with blinds. Includes washer/dryer in bathroom area.
